QuestData.Title: Taking the Fight to Nagrand
QuestData.Description:
**Eyes Only -- Commander $n**
Durotan recommended dat we be gettin' a foothold in Nagrand, so I taken the liberty of dispatchin' some of da boys.
Thrall's already reportin' the new outpost be nearly complete. He been askin' me to let ya know they be ready for ya.
A windrider be waitin' to catch ya up with the latest caravan shipment whenever you be ready, $g sir:ma'am;.
-- Rokhan
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Stone Guard Brox at the caravan in Nagrand.
QuestData.RewardText: They came at us... from... nowhere.$B$B<The stoneguard nearly passes out.>
